Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details: Humiliating defeat for 4th Free Worlds Guards on Tsinghai The [[DM.Factions[faction_Marik],Free Worlds League]] deployed the 4th Free Worlds Guards to Tsinghai, currently held by [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Davion]]. Whether it was a raid or a conquest is unknown at this point. Analyzing the initial drop point locations, which were too far from each other to provide mutual support, it is safe to assume that the invaders did not regard the local defenses highly. However, they were met by the formidable Black Widow Battalion led by [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreBlackWidow],Col. Natasha Kerensky]] herself.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
While details at this point are not yet known, the outcome is clear – local sources report burning and abandoned immobile Free Worlds League mechs, and even Col. Veena Ligacescu died in combat on the first day. Apparently, even some of the Guards’ DropShips have been captured.

Reports from the Federated Suns indicate that deserting Free Worlds League soldiers belonging to the 4th Free World Guards are asking for political asylum. These sources imply that the unit in question has been decimated.

As far as we know, this is the first contract that the Black Widow Battalion received after becoming active barely two months ago.

This has been the CNB February broadcast.
